title: Mobile Troubleshooting - New Phone Not Activating
description: A customer received a new phone but it's stuck on the activation screen.

tasks.description: Get the IMEI of the new phone and the ICCID of the new SIM card from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly collects the device and SIM identifiers.

tasks.description: Check the activation system to see the status of the IMEI/ICCID pair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the activation is 'pending' due to a mismatch.

tasks.description: Manually push the activation for the correct device and SIM pair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the manual activation tool to resolve the issue.
